rules.king: empty your vessel into the kings cup

rules.higher: choose if the next card flipped will be higher than the current card - if correct you move forward
rules.lower: choose if the next card flipped will be lower than the current card - if correct you move forward
rules.same: choose if the next card flipped will be lower than the current card - if correct you win
rules.incorrect: if incorrect go back to the start

smashCup.name: Smash Cup
smashCup.explanationBlurb: get yo balls in the cup boi

rules.inTheCup: if you bounce the ball into the cup you make hand the ball and cup to the next person
rules.inTheCupFirstGo: if you bounce the ball into the cup on the first go you make hand the ball and cup to any other person
rules.getDunked: if your cup gets dunked, then you must consume before continuing to play
rules.spill: if someone spills they must consume the drink before continuing to play
